text: Ryszard Kucjas (4 December 1922 - 22 November 1994) was a Polish gymnast. He competed in eight events at the 1952 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1922 births Category:1994 deaths Category:Polish male artistic gymnasts Category:Olympic gymnasts of Poland Category:Gymnasts at the 1952 Summer Olympics Category:People from Rybnik
title: Ryszard Kucjas
